mapper.update:
update oms_cer_get_task
OMS_ID = #{omsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CER_ID = #{cerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSI_ID = #{busiId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RF_B0000 = #{rfB0000,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZJLX = #{zjlx,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ZJHM = #{zjhm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GET_STATUS = #{getStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HAPPEN_DATE = #{happenDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DATA_SOURCE = #{dataSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GET_PEOPLE = #{getPeople,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GET_TIME = #{getTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATOR = #{updator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CER_GET_ELE_SIGN = #{cerGetEleSign,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
SPB_GET_ELE_SIGN = #{spbGetEleSign,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

mapper.select: SELECT user_id, FINGERPRINT_1 fingerprint1, FINGERPRINT_2 fingerprint2 FROM cf_user WHERE user_state='1' AND user_name = #{name} AND IDNUMBER = #{idNo}
mapper.sql: SELECT a.id, a.cer_id cerId, c.work_unit workUnit, b.name, if(b.sex='1','男',if(b.sex='2','女',b.sex)) sex, b.csrq, c.post, a.get_status getStatus, (select item_name from sys_dict_item where dict_code='zjlqzt' and item_code=a.get_status) getStatusName, b.zjlx, (select item_name from sys_dict_item where dict_code='zjlx' and item_code=b.zjlx) zjlxName, b.zjhm, b.yxqz, b.card_status cardStatus, (select item_name from sys_dict_item where dict_code='ZJZT' and item_code=b.card_status) cardStatusName, a.spb_get_ele_sign spb, if(b.surely_way='0','证照机',if(b.surely_way='1','柜台',b.surely_way)) surelyWay, b.cabinet_num cabinetNum, b.place, b.counter_num counterNum, a.data_source dataSource, a.happen_Date happenDate, a.create_time createTime, a.get_time getTime FROM
